name: Cribbage Board by Blacktop Interactive
description:
Travel Cribbage board and hand calculator.

Grab a deck of cards, an opponent and this app to play Cribbage anywhere! This app was designed by hand to bring the look and feel of a Cribbage board to the iPad. As you drag the pieces, a visual counter will appear showing you how far you've moved. Tap on the question mark to access the quick guide. With this app, you can leave the cribbage board at home the next time you travel.

Use the Cribbage hand calculator within the help menu to double check your scores on high point hands.

Please send comments or suggestions to info@blacktopinteractive.com.
